title: State Department's Anti-ISIS Videos Compete For Recruits' Attention
teaser: Robert Siegel talks to Farah Pandith about the effectiveness of the State Department's anti-ISIS videos.
contentencoded:
Robert Siegel talks to Farah Pandith about the effectiveness of the State Department's anti-ISIS videos. Pandith was the first special representative to Muslim communities and served under both the Bush and Obama administrations
